title: TDCP, AG tour sign MoU for tourism promotion
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 24 (APP):The Tourism Development Corporation of Punjab (TDCP) and AG Tour signed the Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for the promotion of tourism and to facilitate the tourists about their destinations.
The signing ceremony was held at Patriata Chairlift, in which the TDCP Regional Manager and an official of AG Tour signed the agreement. Other TDCP officers were also present on this occasion, according to a press release issued here on Saturday.
Talking to the media, the Regional Manager said that the purpose of the agreement is to work together for the promotion of tourism and to highlight new tourist destinations and entertainment places across Punjab.
He further said that AG Tour will effectively take steps to make TDCPâ€™s tourist spots more attractive and enjoyable.
